Desc.eng: We are holding out, sir, but those blasted ornithopters are a menace. We should destroy their launch tower before the next attack. Scouts report three control stations in the tower. We might use them to disable those infernal machines.
Possibly. But we’d need someone with proper expertise to do that. Where are the engineers?
Alright. I’ll see if I can take care of those ornithopters for you.
It doesn’t matter, captain. They won’t be a problem.
As far as I know, they are at the weapons depot on the upper factory grounds.
